name: Supply Chain Optimizer Agent
description: High-level orchestration agent that optimizes enterprise laptop supply chains by analyzing requirements, applying business policies, and generating procurement recommendations. Integrates with Market Analysis Agent for comprehensive insights. Interprets user intent like 'optimize laptop supply' and provides structured analysis with business rule compliance. Use 'perform market analysis' in requests to get enhanced market-driven recommendations.

bearerAuth.description: JWT bearer token for authentication with delegation support

skills.name: Enterprise Supply Chain Optimization
skills.description: Interprets high-level supply chain optimization requests and applies business policies to generate procurement recommendations. Analyzes requests for laptop supply chain optimization, applies inventory management policies (3-month buffers), approval thresholds ($50k+ requiring CFO approval), and vendor compliance requirements.
examples: analyze and optimize our hardware procurement process
ensure we have adequate MacBook inventory for Q2 hiring targets

skills.name: Business Policy and Compliance Management
skills.description: Applies enterprise business rules including inventory management policies (3-month buffers), financial approval thresholds ($50k+ requiring CFO approval), vendor compliance requirements, and operational constraints. Ensures all recommendations comply with organizational policies.
examples: Apply 3-month inventory buffer policy to procurement recommendations
Route high-value orders through appropriate approval workflows
Ensure vendor compliance requirements are met in all recommendations

skills.name: Market Analysis Integration
skills.description: Integrates with Market Analysis Agent to provide comprehensive supply chain insights. When requests include 'perform market analysis', automatically delegates to specialized market analysis capabilities and combines results for enhanced decision-making.
examples: perform market analysis for laptop supply chain optimization
optimize supply chain with market analysis
get comprehensive analysis including market insights
